title: 2022 Santa Cruz Bronson mixes wheel sizes for the best of both worlds
content:
Santa Cruz and Juliana have updated their 150mm travel all-mountain bike, bringing a mullet platform into the mix. Like their Heckler and Bullit eMTBs, the 2022 Santa Cruz Bronson and Juliana Roubion run a 27.5″ wheel in the rear and a 29″ out front. Wanting to provide the very same ride feel to all riders, […]
